Field Description: The three character transaction type or detail record type. These values reside in the Record Type Table.

If this is the first transaction within a group, the Transaction Sequence # must be equal to 00000000. Otherwise, for transaction headers, the Transaction Sequence # must be equal to the previous transaction header's Transaction Sequence # incremented by 1. For detail records, the Transaction Sequence # must be equal to the Transaction Sequence # of the previous transaction header.
For transaction headers, always set to 00000000. For detail records, set this field to the Record Sequence # of the previous record written to the file incremented by 1.
